title: Redesign CupCakeMC site to match uploaded screenshots (homepage sections + navbar)

requirements.text: Redesign the global navigation header to match the uploaded screenshots: left-aligned CupCakeMC logo/brand, centered nav links (Home, Shop, Vote, Discord), and right-aligned cart icon + Login button, using a dark/black translucent bar with a thin pink accent/border and consistent hover states.
acceptanceCriteria: On desktop widths, nav links appear centered in the header with consistent spacing, matching the screenshot layout.
Header background is dark/black with subtle translucency and a thin pink divider/border line as in the screenshots.
Cart icon and Login button are right-aligned and visually consistent with the screenshot styling (rounded button, pink accent).
Mobile header retains a functional mobile menu and does not break login/cart functionality.

requirements.text: Update the Home page to recreate all homepage sections shown in the screenshots, in the same order: (1) hero/intro area with CupCake branding, (2) Server Status card, (3) Vote section card, (4) Discord section card, (5) “Why Choose CupCakeMC?” three-feature grid; ensure layout, typography, and spacing visually match the screenshots.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage section order matches the screenshots: Server Status → Vote → Discord → Why Choose CupCakeMC.
Each section is presented as a centered dark card with subtle border/glow styling consistent with the screenshots.
“Why Choose CupCakeMC?” shows three feature cards with icon, title, and description in a 3-column layout on desktop and a stacked layout on mobile.
All existing routes (Shop/Vote/Discord) remain navigable and functional from the Home page.

requirements.text: Make the Home page “Vote for the Server” section match the screenshots by rendering a list of voting-site buttons (name on the left, external-link icon on the right) using the existing website config vote URLs when available, with sensible fallback defaults (e.g., Minecraft-mp.com, TopG.org).

quotes: can you edit the website like that?

acceptanceCriteria: If vote URLs exist in website config, the Home page Vote section renders one button per URL; otherwise it shows the fallback sites.
Each voting site row opens in a new tab and has an external-link icon aligned to the right.
The Vote section matches the screenshot’s card + button-row visual style (dark rows, subtle borders, pink hover accents).

requirements.text: Make the Home page “Join Our Discord” section match the screenshots: centered Discord icon above a pink headline, short descriptive text, and a prominent button that opens the configured Discord invite link in a new tab (with fallback if not configured).
acceptanceCriteria: Discord section uses a centered Discord icon and a large pink title consistent with the screenshots.
Clicking the Discord button opens the configured invite URL in a new tab (with a fallback URL if missing).
The section is displayed as a centered dark card with border/glow consistent with the screenshots.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent CupCakeMC visual theme across the site to match the screenshots: dark background, pink accent color, soft glow/border treatments on cards, and a pixel/arcade-like heading style for key titles (e.g., “Vote for the Server”, “Why Choose CupCakeMC?”).
acceptanceCriteria: Key section headings on Home/Vote/Discord pages use a consistent pixel/arcade-like style and pink accent color.
Cards and buttons across Home/Vote/Discord/Shop pages share the same dark + pink accent theme (borders/hover/focus states).
No user-facing text is introduced in a language other than English.

requirements.text: Add and use the CupCake SMP logo provided by the user as the primary branding asset in the header (and as a favicon/app icon where applicable), ensuring the logo has a transparent background variant for clean display on the dark navbar.
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays the CupCake SMP logo next to the brand name, with clean edges on the dark background (transparent logo variant).
A square favicon/app icon derived from the provided logo is included and referenced by the app.
Branding remains consistent across main pages (Home/Shop/Vote/Discord).

requirements.text: Store required generated images in frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not serve generated images via the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: All newly generated image files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Frontend references use static paths (e.g., /assets/generated/...) and work in production builds.
No backend endpoints are added for image delivery.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain single-actor (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo); only add a migration file if existing stable state must change.
nonGoals: Do not implement new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Do not add real-time features (websockets/chat) or external databases.
Do not change shop/checkout business logic unless required purely for styling/layout consistency.

required: CupCake SMP pixel-art logo with transparent background (cupcakesmp-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png)
Dark blurred Minecraft-style hero/banner background image (hero-bg-blur.dim_1920x600.png)
